details:
Under not completely understood conditions, dhclient completely removes
IPv6 addresses from use and is unable to restore them.


For Debian 10 buster, this problem has been fixed in version
4.4.1-2+deb10u3.


We recommend that you upgrade your isc-dhcp packages.


For the detailed security status of isc-dhcp please refer to
its security tracker page at:
<https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/isc-dhcp>


Further information about Debian LTS security advisories, how to apply
these updates to your system and frequently asked questions can be
found at: <https://wiki.debian.org/LTS>
